mapper.sql: m_id, meeting, meetingtime, meetingaddr, remark, is_del
mapper.select: SELECT count(m_id) FROM meeting WHERE is_del = '0'
mapper.insert:
insert into meeting
m_id,
meeting,
meetingtime,
meetingaddr,
remark,
is_del,

update meeting
meeting = #{meeting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meetingtime = #{meetingtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meetingaddr = #{meetingaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
